title: Punishing Putin: How Joe Biden could cut Russia off from world tech - CNBCTV18
content: Punishing Putin: How Joe Biden could cut Russia off from world tech  CNBCTV18
description: Such measures, whose details have not been previously reported, are part of an initial suite of export control penalties that the United States has prepared to damage Russia's economy, targeting everything from lasers to telecoms equipment and maritime items.
